name: Burger Bomber Buddy
description:
Your little buddy is starving, really bad he's gonna need a lot of burgers.

Unfortunately, you are trying to feed him in the bomb factory, not a great move on your part, but you have to work with what you got.

Play with your mouse to drag and drop the burgers on your buddy, and avoid feeding him bombs. If his meter empties without getting a burger, he'll be a real sad guy.

Good luck!

Music : Inspiring 8-bit - Phill Dillow
https://pixabay.com/music/video-games-inspiring-8-bit-563/
